title: Aero Supplies
author: ''
date: '2022-10-25'
slug: aero_supplies
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Aero Supplies. The average
  contract duration was 0.05 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $23.3K. The longest
  contract was 0.37 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $365.2K.
lookup_name: 'AERO SUPPLIES'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '352'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '22'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '6%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '4%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.05'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '186.9K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.05'
s421_mean_contract_value: '23.3K'
s425_max_duration: '0.37'
s422_max_contract_value: '365.2K'
---
